title: About
headline: Hello, I'm k402xxxcenxxx
body: I am a Site Reliability Engineer (SRE) with a passion for building scalable and reliable systems. I specialize in automating infrastructure, optimizing performance, and ensuring high availability for mission-critical applications.

With over 5 years of experience in the tech industry, I have worked on various projects ranging from web applications to large-scale distributed systems. My expertise lies in leveraging cloud technologies, containerization, and CI/CD pipelines to streamline operations and enhance system resilience.
When I'm not working on improving system reliability, I enjoy exploring new technologies, contributing to open-source projects, and sharing knowledge with the tech community.
